name: Rush Evolution
description:
You are in rush hour! You have to level your car up by overtaking other cars and unlock new and better cars as you overtake them!

The controls are very easy, tap and hold to accelerate. Release to slow down.
developers: Lagot Games Yazilim ve Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi
publishers: Lagot Games Yazilim ve Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi
